#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define gc getchar_unlocked
#define pc putchar_unlocked

//inline int getchar_unlocked() { return getchar(); }
//inline int putchar_unlocked() { return putchar(); }
char buf[23];
inline void out(int &x){register int i=22;buf[22]='\n';do{buf[--i]=(x%10)+48;x/=10;}while(x);do{pc(buf[i]);}while(buf[i++]!='\n');}
inline void inp(int &x){register int c=gc();x=0;for(;((c<48||c>57)&&c!='-');c=gc());for(;c>47&&c<58;c=gc()){x=(x*10)+(c-48);}}

int main()
{
    int test;
    inp(test);
    while (test--){
        int n,t;
        inp(n);
        int s=0;
        if (n%2==0){
            int t=(n-1)/2;
            s=t*(t+1);
            s+=n/2;
        }
        else{
            t=n/2;
            s=t*(t+1);
        }
        out(s);
        //printf("%d",s);
        printf("\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
